name: Dash Dash Dot Dash
description:
With the invention of the telegraph, people could communicate faster than ever before in history. Help the citizens in this barren land between a mountain range and the open sea to connect to each other.

This is my contribution to the 2022 Lost Relic Game Jam.

***

Thanks to Admiral Bob for the song:

http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/admiralbob77/61040
